block1.title: Hong Kong Education City

block2.title: ACA
block2.subtitle: To promote a caring and non-violent environment for the optimal growth and development of our children.

block3.title: e-Help Association
block3.subtitle: Establish a mechanism with the cooperation of various stakeholders both in local and global level to combat the dissemination of Child Sexual Abusive Materials (CSAM) online

block4.title: End Child Sexual Abuse Foundation
block4.subtitle: To protect youngsters under 18 from sexual abuse

block5.title: Google Safety Center
block5.subtitle: As the Internet evolves, this means continuously advancing Googleâ€™s security technologies and privacy tools to help keep Google users safe online.

block6.title: Facebook Safety Center
block6.subtitle: Facebook work with external experts, including a Safety Advisory Board, and gather feedback from our community to develop policies, tools and resources to keep users safe.

block7.title: INHOPE Association
block7.subtitle: INHOPE is an active and collaborative global network of Hotlines, dealing with illegal content online and committed to stamping out child sexual abuse from the Internet.

block8.title: UK Safer Internet Centre
block8.subtitle: To promote the safe and responsible use of technology for young people.
